title: Annual Information Return of Creditable Income Taxes Withheld (Expanded)/Income Payments Exempt from Withholding Tax

fields.label: Withholding Agent’s Name (Last Name, First Name, Middle Name for Individual OR Registered Name for Non-Individual)

Registered Address (Indicate complete address. If branch, indicate the branch address. If the registered address is different from the current address, go to the RDO to update registered address by using BIR Form No. 1905)
Schedule 1 – Remittance per BIR Form No. 1601-EQ
fields.summary: Fill in remittance details for each quarter.

fields.label: Schedule 2 – Remittance per BIR Form No. 1606
fields.summary: Fill in remittance details for each month.

sections.title: Part III – Alphabetical List of Payees (Format Only)

fields.label: Schedule 3 - Alphalist of Payees Subject to Expanded Withholding Tax (Declared and Certified using BIR Form No.2307)
Signature over Printed Name of Taxpayer/Authorized Representative/Tax Agent (Indicate Title/Designation and TIN)
Signature over Printed Name of President/Vice President/Authorized Officer or Representative/Tax Agent (Indicate Title/Designation and TIN)
Tax Agent Accreditation No./Date of Issue
fields.summary: Enter accreditation number and issue date.
